urls.title: No, Trump Didn't Cut the CDC's Coronavirus Budget. No, People Aren't Blaming Corona Beer for the Disease.
urls.description: Coronavirus misinformation is spreading faster than the disease itself.

text:
@RyanAFournier Since we seem to still be on topic of misinformation let's clarify:

Budget wasn't cut, neither is beer the cause. 

https://t.co/zjLaCducdI

No fired officials

https://t.co/BqY7rWyzDz
